name: Battleships (itch)
description:
This program was written as a University programming assignment so I thought I'd just put it up here for people to try. 

If you leave the player name blank then that player will be taken over by the computer allowing player1 vs player 2, p1 vs CPU, CPU vs p2, and CPU vs CPU matches.

When choosing where to put your ships it must be formatted like, f1s, which would place the ship origin at f1 and the rest of the ship will be south of f1.
